title: How to Stay Alive in Earthbound

steps.headline: Level up.
steps.description: You may struggle in the beginning of the game with the Sharks near the arcade, who are much higher in level than you. You are better off leveling up your character as best as you can by killing them one by one. Don't get upset if you die from time to time.

steps.headline: Always use PSI!
steps.description: Your best PSI is PK Freeze - it's very helpful during the game, which does about 150-500 damage.

steps.headline: Don't be afraid to run.
steps.description: It's difficult to run in Earthbound, so use it as a last resort. Don't completely ditch the idea, though, as it may just save you the trouble.

steps.headline: Have additional life.
steps.description: To stay alive, make sure you have PSI Life up.

steps.headline: Keep your equipment upgraded.
steps.description: Make sure that your party has the most powerful equipment available, be it weapons or armor.

steps.headline: Buy items.
steps.description: Food is a good replacement for healing if you don't have PP to spare.

steps.headline: Level up to stay alive longer and your HP or PP or your damage will help later!

text: Level up. You may struggle in the beginning of the game with the Sharks near the arcade, who are much higher in level than you. You are better off leveling up your character as best as you can by killing them one by one. Don't get upset if you die from time to time. Always use PSI! Your best PSI is PK Freeze - it's very helpful during the game, which does about 150-500 damage. Don't be afraid to run. It's difficult to run in Earthbound, so use it as a last resort. Don't completely ditch the idea, though, as it may just save you the trouble. Have additional life. To stay alive, make sure you have PSI Life up. Keep your equipment upgraded. Make sure that your party has the most powerful equipment available, be it weapons or armor. Buy items. Food is a good replacement for healing if you don't have PP to spare. Level up to stay alive longer and your HP or PP or your damage will help later!
